activities:
SVSI is a leading provider of travel reservation technology to the destination travel market.  For personal information of customers SVSI receives from the European Economic Area and from Switzerland, SVSI has committed to handling such personal information in accordance with the U.S.-EU Safe Harbor Framework and the U.S. Switzerland Safe Harbor Framework. We use this data to process your purchase of travel products, goods or services, collect or refund payment, cancel or modify a reservation, perform testing and QA functions to improve our software and to perform back office business functions related to accounting, billing and auditing.  
SVSI discloses your personal information to our travel suppliers with whom you have purchased lodging, activities or other goods and services and also to third party agents and service providers acting on their behalf in order to process your order.
